main event: On the evening of Aug 18, a bright silver object was observed moving slowly across the sky from north to south, appearing the size of the full moon and pulsating with a brilliant white light.
interesting points: The object was observed for several minutes before disappearing from sight., It appeared much higher than any known aircraft., The object pulsated and sometimes flashed its light., Observers included a Catholic priest and his housekeeper, who all agreed on what they saw., The witness expressed a desire for insights on the phenomenon and stated he was not prone to imagining things.
sighted object: a bright silver object pulsating with white light
witness description: a mature adult, a Catholic priest, and his housekeeper
